/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the left side of the street, trees and street furniture provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, mirroring the overcast sky and the natural elements within the cityscape.
